concept.title: Link - Eclipse Plugin
concept.shortdesc: The Links plugin adds Links between files

section.p: The eclipse plugin for Links helps you to more quickly add links to your source/documentation files.

section.title: Installing the Links Plugin for the Eclipse IDE
section.p:
Links comes bundled with the Eclipse ‘Docfacto Toolkit’. If you don't have the Docfacto Toolkit, install the feature from Docfacto update site ().
The Links plugin should be available after you restart eclipse.
